div.p: Datawind 7SC* is a voice calling tablet with innumerable connectivity options such as Wi-Fi, 3G through dongle and much more. It features a large 17.78 cm (7) capacitive display that makes your images and videos come alive with ultimate clarity and picturesque details. 7SC* tablet runs on the latest Android 4.4.2 KitKat operating system (OS) along with the advanced 1.3 GHz single-core processor. You can transfer files, play exciting games, download your favourite movies and browse web at superfast speed with this high performance tablet brought to you by Datawind.

Technology on your fingertips! Datawind Ubislate 7SC tablet is a hi-end Android tablet that offers you various functionalities that you can use on day to day basis. With numerous games, entertainment and utility apps, this tablet give you wholesome entertainment wherever you want. Ubislate 7SC is a calling tablet and is power packed with the latest technology and due to its sleek design it just slip in your sling or hand bag comfortably. The tablet is very compact and light in weight and hence it becomes very easy to travel with it. The innovative design and latest Android technology makes this tablet a hot entity in the entire IT industry. You can make swift switch overs and can download and upload the data at superfast speed. Ubislate 7SC has got a powerful battery hence, you can perform all your tasks without the tension of your tablets battery drying up. Now you can get unlimited internet browsing on your Ubislate tablet as Datawind is giving free internet on Reliance GSM network for an entire year.

With a 7 inch wide and a capacitive 5-Point display, Ublislate 7SC you will give you phenomenal picture quality. If you are a movie or a gaming buff then this tablet will enhance your entire experience. With its rich contrast, color brightness and unmatched screen resolution the picture on your tablet will be crystal clear and without any distortion. Due to its high resolution quality you can analyze and appreciate the minutest of the details and have a brilliant experience while watching videos on Ubislate 7SCon the go.

Datawind products are always packed with the latest technology and therefore Ubislate 7SC is loaded with Android 4.4.2 OS (KitKat). This operating system enhances the performance of the tablet by many folds. You will able to download numerous applications without any hassle. Basically KitKat operating system helps in making the performance of the device to an all-time high by optimizing its memory and by improving the touchscreen functionality of your device. This will help in faster and more accurate working of the tablet.

div.h4: 4GB Internal Memory and Expandable up to 32GB
div.p: Store as much data as you want in your Ubislate 7SC tablet as it comes with an internal memory of 4GB which can be expandable up to 32GB. That means more movies, more videos, more pictures, more games, more data and more entertainment.

The brilliant battery backup makes this tablet travel friendly. Ubislate 7SC has a brilliant battery backup with 2400 mAh battery hence, you dont need to charge it again and again and can watch videos and play games without thinking about the battery drying up early. Once you charge the battery of your tablet to 100% then you can use the tablet seamlessly without any hassle.
